tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: If you are looking for a class that you can BS your way through, then skip this class. However, if you actually value your education and put in the work and show up, this class is invaluable, no matter what degree you are seeking. Mr. Douglas is the MAN. Very into what he teaches, and very sarcastic, but he is a very respectable person.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Hardest 101 ever, but worth the effort. It\'s your job to earn the grade not his. A wicked sense of humor. If you bring up questions he\'s answered 10 times, He will smack you down with some of the best sarcasm there is. I might sound like I didn\'t like this professor, but he rocked. If you fail at least it was entertaining for you.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Great teacher. Very understanding. He may come off as harsh but he just really wants people in his class to act like adults as opposed to high school students. just try and you will do just fine.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: would recommend, just do ur speeches, the 10 question quizzes every week & show up every day to hear him make u laugh! he told me i have the funniest persuasive speech (dental hygiene)he ever heard

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Mr.Douglas was an awesome speech professor. Very understanding and his sense of humor made the class fun. Definitely not a waste of time. I would highly recommend.
